title: Ghost Defeat on Ranked 3v3s
body:
My team and I, "Team Shruby2", just finished playing our first promotional in Gold 1 and after the match (which we won) it showed a win and a loss. 

That night we started at Gold 1 with 0LP and played straight back to back games up to our promotionals and won the first one, as well as every match that day leading up to that, so we are very confused and a bit disheartened as to where this loss came from as we haven't lost any of our last eight 3v3 games. Let alone one of our provisionals. We don't have very much time to play and we have been fighting hard for these wins and points and would really like to keep the ones we earn.

replies.body:
Hey Bard,

I looked into this and it seems that you guys had a queue dodge right after your Promotional series started. Similar to solo queue, 3v3 and 5v5 matches instantly counted as a loss during Promos when a player on your side dodges from champ select. Let me know if you have any questions.

Ah I see, yeah I remember that. Friend didn't realize it was his turn to pick a champ and when the timer ran out it booted us.

Thank you for the reply. ^^   We are just happy to know the reason so thank you and we will be more careful about that.

Hey there 

Sounds like it's probably just a visual bug. If you want to be sure of your stats before you continue playing, [open a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and ask a Rioter to look into it for you. :)
